title: VAT Filing Process
source_body: This module explains the VAT filing process for Ethiopian businesses.
original_text: Amharic translation of: This module explains the VAT filing process for Ethiopian businesses....
translated_text: This module explains the VAT filing process for Ethiopian businesses.

description.en: Register for e-Tax account at etrax.mor.gov.et
Gather required documents: Business license, TIN, financial statements
description.am: ያስፈላጊ ሰነዶችን ያሰኩ: የቢዝነስ ፈቃድ, የትክስ መለያ ቁጥር, የሂኑድ መግለጫዎች

question.en: What is the deadline for VAT filing?
question.am: የቫት መግለጫ ለማስገባት የሚያስፈልግ ጊዜ መቼ ነው?

answer.en: VAT returns must be filed monthly by the 10th of the following month.
answer.am: የቫት መግለጫዎች በየወሩ በሚቀጥለው ወር በ10 ላይ መገናኘት አለባቸው።

description.en: For a business with $10,000 sales and $4,000 purchases, VAT payable would be $600 (15% of net sales).
description.am: ለ $10,000 የሽያጭ እና $4,000 የግዢ ያለው ንግድ በተመለሰ ሽያጭ ላይ 15% የሚሆነው የሚከፈል ቫት $600 ነው።

title: Income Tax Filing Process
source_body: This module explains the income tax filing process for Ethiopian businesses.
original_text: Amharic translation of: This module explains the income tax filing process for Ethiopian businesses....
translated_text: This module explains the income tax filing process for Ethiopian businesses.

description.am: ወደ የገቢ ግብ መግለጫ ክፍል ይድረሱ

question.en: What is the corporate income tax rate?
question.am: የኮርፖሬት ገቢ ግብ መጠን ስንት ነው?

answer.en: The standard corporate income tax rate in Ethiopia is 30%.
answer.am: በኢትዮጵያ ውስጥ የመደበኛው የኮርፖሬት ገቢ ግብ መጠን 30% ነው።
